channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Vantara -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Vantara -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3695|2024-08-03T01:14:03.359Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.3.0.0, 9.2.0.4 and 8.3.0.27 allow a malicious URL to inject content into a dashboard when the CDE plugin is present.

item.title: CVE-2022-4815|2024-08-03T01:48:40.490Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 9.4.0.1 and 9.3.0.3, including 8.3.x deserialize untrusted JSON data without constraining the parser to approved classes and methods.

item.title: CVE-2022-3960|2024-08-03T01:27:53.737Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.4.0.1 and 9.3.0.2, including 8.3.x cannot allow a system administrator to disable scripting capabilities of the Community Dashboard Editor (CDE) plugin.

item.title: CVE-2022-4770|2024-08-03T01:48:40.442Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.4.0.0 and 9.3.0.2, including 8.3.x display the full parametrized SQL query in an error message when an invalid character is used within a Pentaho Report (*.prpt).

item.title: CVE-2022-4769|2024-08-03T01:48:40.579Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.4.0.0 and 9.3.0.2, including 8.3.x display the target path on host when a file is uploaded with an invalid character in its name.

item.title: CVE-2022-4771|2024-08-03T01:48:40.437Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 9.4.0.1 and 9.3.0.2, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Pentaho User Console through session variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-5617|2024-08-02T08:07:32.308Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.6, including 9.5.x and 8.3.x, display the version of Tomcat when a server error is encountered.

item.title: CVE-2024-28982|2024-08-02T01:03:51.450Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x do not correctly protect the ACL service endpoint of the Pentaho User Console against XML External Entity Reference.

item.title: CVE-2024-28983|2024-08-02T01:03:51.428Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-28984|2024-08-02T01:03:51.332Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20business%20analytics%20server
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.

item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Business Analytics Server prior to versions 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.7, including 8.3.x allow a malicious URL to inject content into the Analyzer plugin interface.
